vibesExplanation: The workout video '45' RIDE - Who Runs The World' on Kristina Girod's channel embodies multiple workout vibes. The "The Nightclub Workout" vibe is highly suitable (score: 0.9) due to the energetic spin class format, suggesting a party-like atmosphere enhanced by motivating music, as confirmed by comments highlighting positive vibes and music enjoyment. "The Endorphin Wave" is also a strong match (score: 0.8) because comments indicate a feel-good, motivational cycling experience designed to elevate energy progressively throughout the class. The involvement of music and motivational coaching is crucial in building this sensation. Additionally, "The Meditative Grind" vibe (score: 0.7) fits moderately well as the workout focuses on cycling endurance and mindset, allowing participants to zone in and engage in a repetitive, meditative rhythm. Despite the underlying intensity, the emphasis on maintaining a strong mindset and the structure of the cycling class contribute to this vibe.
